overview: This collection of live performances features the influential Cuban group Trio Matamoros, who rose to fame in the 1920s and '30s with their trademark bolero-son style, and also captures other artists interpreting the group's songs. Tracks include "Por Que Pasaron Rapido," "Pobre Bohemia," "Santiaguera," "Conciencia," "Mi Veracion," "El Trio y el Ciclon," "Lagrimas Negras," "Reclamo Mistico," "Son de la Loma" and "Homenaje Matamoros."
title: Trio Matamoros: Eternamente Matamoros
